Key Match Events: I. PITTAS scored the winning goal for Cyprus in the 35th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lithuania lost 0-1 to Cyprus in the UEFA Nations League
Lithuania is at the bottom of Group 3 with 0 points
Cyprus is 3rd in Group 3 with 6 points
Lithuania's T. KALINAUSKAS was given a yellow card in the 69th minute
Cyprus's H. KYPRIANOU was given a yellow card in the 33rd minute
Cyprus's A. PANAYIOTOU was given a yellow card in the 45+3' minute
Cyprus's A. KARO was given a yellow card in the 57th minute
Cyprus's A. CHRYSOSTOMOU was given a yellow card in the 70th minute
Cyprus's S. ANDREOU was given a yellow card in the 72nd minute
Others: The match was played on September 6th, 2024, at 4:00 PM
